title: kuzhalOshai kUTTi
sahitya:
kuzhalOshai kUTTi ennai gOpAlan azhaikkinrAn


anupallavi

  kuzhalOshaiyum kATTik-karandu ninru kUvugirAn ezhum Ashaiyadu tIra evvaNNam shelvEnO


caraNam    maruL vAzhkkai vanamIdil vazhi kANAd-alaiginrEn peru yAnai matam koNDu piLirOshai tanil vADi 
iruL shErndu naliginrEn iraiyEnum vazhi kANEn aruL kUDi avanE vandaNaivAnO ariyEnE
